subtitles:
177920 180480 - Oh, God.
- Keep your shit together.
180560 183518 lf you wanna get 'em out of here.

184320 186880 - l can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it.

211040 213759 l know who you are.
l know what you think...

213840 217515 lf you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

217600 222628 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

222720 226030 - lnfected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

234280 237317 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

239360 243478 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
243560 245073 We'll get you out of here.

245160 249631 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
266280 268316 Get it off! Get it off!

271800 274872 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her.

283200 286272 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now.

963040 965793 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up.

973600 976068 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1002280 1005716 - Let's go. Let's go.
- What the fuck is going on?

1034480 1039031 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1041120 1046114 The man goes to leave and the barman says
''You can't leave that lying there.''
1046200 1050079 He says ''lt's not a lion. lt's a giraffe''.
1060240 1063038 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1069560 1072916 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1077320 1083475 l was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1083560 1089078 Then l wake up today in hospital.
l wake up and l'm hallucinating.

1111680 1117676 lt started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1117760 1121753 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1122600 1125239 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1125320 1129836 lt was in the street outside.
lt was coming through your windows.
1133560 1136279 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1138800 1141189 There was something in the blood.

1142600 1147355 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1154200 1156794 And that's when the exodus started.

1160840 1164355 there were reports of lnfection
in Paris and New York.
1166640 1169438 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1172280 1175113 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1177640 1181553 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane.

1181640 1185758 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1187160 1190118 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1190720 1194713 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1212360 1216194 l have to find them.
They live in Deptford. l can walk it.
1216280 1218748 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1232920 1237152 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1239560 1243473 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1247480 1250916 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together.

1265000 1268037 lf you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1293840 1297515 - lf there's anyone in there who...
- l understand.

1425680 1429468 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1435680 1439992 My parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1442520 1447640 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1448240 1450515 l remember my dad had all this cash,
1450600 1453797 even though cash was completely useless.
1455280 1458272 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1463600 1465830 l lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1467920 1470150 l remember the ground was soft.

1472040 1476238 l looked down
and l was standing on all these people.
1476320 1480108 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1480200 1483988 Somewhere in the crowd
there were lnfected. lt spread fast.

1484080 1487277 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1488840 1491798 Climb over more people.
So l did that. l climbed.
1491880 1494155 And l got up on top of this kiosk.

1496360 1501115 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1501200 1504909 Then l saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1518440 1523389 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1525960 1528679 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1528760 1531957 We'll all sleep in the same room. lt's safer.
1630440 1632635 Give me a drink of that, will ya?
1641160 1643151 l'll start working on them, then.

1675240 1678073 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1678160 1680276 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1683400 1686233 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1722520 1724511 Do you have any clothes here?

1727480 1730995 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1731080 1734595 More lnfected will be coming.
They always do.

1762200 1765078 How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1765160 1768914 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. lt was on you.

1769000 1774154 l didn't know he was infected.
He knew. l could see it in his face.

1774240 1778472 lf someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1778560 1783475 lt might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. lt makes no difference.

1783560 1788759 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, l'll do it in a heartbeat.

1788840 1792879 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans?

1792960 1797238 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world orjust fall in love and fuck?
1799800 1802268 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1858600 1861592 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1861680 1864638 Stop talking. lt's a long way up.
1881840 1883831 Now l do need a break.

1902800 1907874 - Why didn't you say something before?
- l didn't think you'd give a shit.

1909040 1913113 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1915320 1917470 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1917560 1922429 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

1927920 1931674 Actually,
l did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2005040 2007918 - Open the fucking door.
- Where's Dad?
2008000 2010195 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2044080 2047470 Good to meet you.
This is my daughter Hannah.
2059840 2062035 Calls for a celebration, l'd say.
2062120 2065032 Why don't you all sit down and...
2065120 2067953 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2068040 2070429 We've got Mum's crème de menthe.

2080960 2083838 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2083920 2086673 Nah, the good ones. lt's a celebration.
2108520 2111478 l know it isn't much, but cheers.

2139120 2144478 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2146080 2148230 You'll have to use the bucket.
2154520 2157034 Have to empty it each morning.

2157120 2160635 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2162440 2165432 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2178240 2180515 l'll take the living room. lt's fine.

2215720 2219269 - So what do you make of them?
- They're desperate.
2220360 2223079 Probably need us more than we need them.

2233920 2238391 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2238480 2242075 - Because if they slowed you down...
- l'd leave them behind.

2246360 2249750 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2265160 2268277 You think l don't get it, but l do get it.

2270080 2273914 And l know l'd be dead already
if l hadn't met you.
2304800 2306791 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2306880 2310839 l thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2310920 2313992 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2329800 2333873 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2333960 2337555 Saw it on TV once, but l can't make it work.
2352960 2355952 We're not going to be able to stay here.

2364520 2368115 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2368200 2372591 Salvation is here.
The answer to lnfection is here.
2372680 2375558 lf you can hear this, you're not alone.

2375640 2379952 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2380040 2382156 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2385480 2389871 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2393320 2397074 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now itjust repeats.
2399520 2402318 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2405920 2410516 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2416160 2421996 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2422080 2425117 - l didn't...
- lt's OK. lt's the truth.
2425200 2427589 l can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2427680 2431468 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. l couldn't risk it.

2433280 2437398 lf it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2437480 2440836 - lt's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to lnfection.

2440920 2445038 There is no answer.
lt's already done all the damage it can.

2445120 2447839 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2447920 2451833 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying.

2456120 2461592 Anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2464920 2469994 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2470680 2472671 We have to try and get there.

2486240 2489835 Just so you know,
l don't take cheques or credit cards.

2517240 2520118 - What do you think?
- lt's the most direct route.

2520200 2525228 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2542120 2544509 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2545360 2548591 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2548680 2552878 We're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars.
2552960 2555758 lt's really fucking obviously a shit idea.
2589960 2592269 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2592360 2595557 Agreed. l think we'd better do this quick.
2597960 2600030 l've got the wheel. You're on the jack.
2614040 2617430 Do you hear that? Hey, do you hear that?

2648120 2652238 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2652320 2655437 Grab hold. One, two, three, lift!

2661640 2666555 - Don't look at them.
- l can see them. They're coming.

2677000 2679798 - Get the tyre on.
- l'm trying.

2692640 2694995 - Get in the car.
- Come on.
2768360 2771796 Don't take anything that needs to be cooked.
2771880 2773632 l think you can eat that raw.

2781000 2785312 lf l never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.
2801080 2804197 ''Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth.''
2856840 2859798 Either we do this now or we're walking.
2909880 2912440 Like going on holidays with your aunt.

3006560 3009233 - Find anything?
- No. Let's get outta here.
3082080 3084958 l can, like, taste the vitamin C.

3147240 3150789 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3150880 3154873 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3155880 3159555 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3170080 3172275 l was thinking l was wrong.

3183240 3187552 lt doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...
3188880 3192190 she's got her dad and he's got his daughter.

3194760 3198230 l was wrong when l said
staying alive is as good as it gets.

3221160 3224994 lt's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3252160 3254720 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3270840 3274549 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3274640 3278758 l didn't need a prescription.
l qualified as a chemist.
3281360 3283828 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3283920 3287469 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3287560 3289710 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3301680 3304274 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3305320 3309154 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3382920 3385593 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3438640 3441996 - Did l miss breakfast?
- You'll sleep through anything.

3442080 3446870 - Did you have a fry-up?
- We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door.
3470440 3474752 Our location is the 42nd blockade, the M602,
3481920 3484832 The answer to lnfection is here.
3519680 3522911 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3524680 3526910 No fire crews to put it out.
3652520 3656354 l don't understand, Dad. Did they leave?

3656440 3659432 - l don't like this. l think we should go.
- No.

3666000 3670630 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3782280 3785078 - Dad?
- Keep away from me. Keep away from me.
3785160 3787549 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
3848200 3850760 Three survivors. One male, two female.
3850840 3854037 l repeat, one male, two female.

3916200 3920876 We've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
3920960 3923269 You can all have a shower.
3923360 3926557 You look like you need one. Please.

3945680 3950674 lt ain't funny. l got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris.
3959120 3962157 She's lost her dad. That's how she is.

3973960 3977396 Don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

3981080 3985870 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like l'll cope.

3985960 3989714 - Just like you'll cope.
- l don't want her to have to fucking cope.
3990960 3993269 l want her to be OK.
3994800 3996870 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
3996960 3999633 lt was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4038120 4041476 - We did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4041560 4047430 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4049760 4053753 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to lnfection.

4058080 4062392 As l said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4062760 4065558 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4065640 4068632 The fire drove hundreds of lnfected
out of Manchester.
4068720 4071678 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4081320 4086952 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4090520 4094593 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4094680 4099151 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4102280 4106990 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4107080 4109389 The belly of the house. The heart.

4109480 4114508 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4116680 4118716 Here you are. l'll swap you.

4118800 4121872 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Give us some.

4121960 4125839 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4128280 4131158 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4154560 4159429 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4166800 4170679 The idea was to learn something
about lnfection.
4192440 4195716 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4206880 4212034 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the lnfected take to starve to death.
4250160 4252515 You'll have to wait and see
4254840 4257308 We hope it's chips, it's chips
4273040 4276271 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4283560 4285915 - lt's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4286000 4289072 Absolutely. l was going to propose a toast
4289160 4292152 but this omelette will do just as well.

4307080 4310834 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4310920 4314196 l thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4320880 4323553 l don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4324360 4329593 l can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4329680 4334037 What a fucking disappointment.
l saw those eggs, l thought it was Christmas.

4334120 4337237 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.

4340120 4343999 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4344080 4348232 - You don't know nothing.
- l think Bill's got a point.
4348320 4351312 lf you look at the whole life of the planet,

4353320 4357279 Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4358000 4360355 So if the infection wipes us all out,

4367360 4370238 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah.
4370320 4373437 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4376200 4381194 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4383880 4387839 This is what l've seen
in the four weeks since lnfection.

4390520 4394877 Which is what l saw in the four weeks before
lnfection, the four weeks before that...

4394960 4400193 As far back as l care to remember,
people killing people.

4400280 4403750 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4411720 4414553 - You're not eating?
- l don't want to eat.

4417400 4420517 l don't want to eat.
l want to bury my dad.
4421400 4424392 He's one of the people you're talking about.

4479960 4483430 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt.
4499440 4501635 l ain't never seen that in my life.

4523360 4528753 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4528840 4530956 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4532680 4537754 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4539320 4541390 - That's an offer.
- Give her some.

4547360 4551672 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4559080 4561992 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4562080 4565390 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4575440 4578034 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4580800 4583268 The rest of you, go with him.

4604760 4608799 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4608880 4610359 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4610440 4615389 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.

4636520 4641116 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4661240 4664869 Eight days ago l found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4666000 4670516 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4670600 4673353 What could l say to him?

4673440 4678434 We fight off the lnfected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4679320 4682995 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4683080 4688950 l moved us from the blockade, l set the radio
broadcasting and l promised them women.

4705800 4707711 - What is it?
- We have to go.
4715480 4717357 We get in the car and we go.

4718680 4723037 No! You're not going to keep them here.
You've got to let them go.

4723120 4726237 You can't keep them here.
Stay where you are.
4726320 4728914 l'm not gonna let you keep them here.
4742280 4744510 l want to give you a chance.
4748200 4750395 But l can't let them go.

4777320 4779959 Smithers says
''Women and semen don't mix.''

4780040 4782838 Mr Burns says
''We all know what you think, Smithers.''

4782920 4785718 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4785800 4789270 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4789360 4793592 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons.

4793680 4796831 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

4796920 4802392 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane.

4803400 4807279 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
4808600 4811592 Just imagine, just think about it.
4812600 4814795 How could lnfection cross the oceans?

4814880 4818998 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? lt can be stopped.

4819080 4821674 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

4821760 4825594 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

4829720 4833156 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

4841560 4845758 ''There is no lnfection.
lt's just people killing people.'' He's insane.

4890400 4893392 - Please...
- Believe me, l'm not interested.

4894440 4899355 You see, l'm gonna have the black one.
And l'm gonna make her squirm.

4899440 4903194 Mitchell, l swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
4906880 4908871 Get up, you cunt. Fucking move.

4932840 4936116 Come on then, you fucking pansies.
Do me first.
4936200 4938589 No, Mitch. Just use the gat.

4938680 4941592 - So you're gonna stick me?
- Shoot 'em.

4944320 4947232 ls that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

4947320 4949151 - l'll shoot them.
- No, you won't.

4949240 4952550 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

4961480 4965268 You stupid cunt. What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

4965360 4969353 - You wanna shoot me? l'll kill you.
- Where's he fucking gone?
4970560 4973279 Fuck it. Get up. Get after him.

4975680 4978752 - Jones, move it.
- l can see him. l can see him.

4988120 4990918 - Can you see him?
- Through there.
5004800 5008110 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5045560 5049348 The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5049440 5052876 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5052960 5055394 which she certainly has no use for.
5056360 5058112 You can't do it to Hannah.

5058200 5061749 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.
5074720 5077393 Come on. lt's only dressing up.

5077480 5080711 - l thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5098680 5102639 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5104440 5107989 - Listen. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5108080 5112073 lf you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5134880 5137633 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5159760 5163548 We're gonna eat these, Hannah.
Come on. Eat these.
5163640 5165710 Are you trying to kill me?
5181960 5184520 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5190120 5192588 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5413240 5415595 lt sounded like a Claymore to me.

5416600 5420388 All right, l'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5423040 5425554 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5438200 5440589 l think they're having an effect.

5455520 5458273 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5459000 5461958 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5462040 5463951 ls that the way it works?

5467360 5471273 l don't think they are coming back.
l think they've been killed.

5489440 5492432 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5492520 5495239 Don't worry. l feel fine. Really.

5517520 5522230 Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5529360 5532591 Don'tjust stand there,
you soppy cunt. Get after them.
5554120 5556953 What the fuck you gonna do now?
5582440 5586035 Defend these stairs with your fucking life.

5757440 5761638 l haven't got any bullets.
l haven't got any fucking bullets.

5822440 5827036 lt's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, l'll get you out of here.

5827120 5831398 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
5831480 5833710 And we'll live happy ever after.
5895440 5897829 That was longer than a heartbeat.
5920440 5922829 We're gonna be OK. lt's not all fucked.

5922920 5926117 - l've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
5934280 5937716 Hannah, it's OK. He's not infected.
5937800 5939791 l thought he was biting you.

5939880 5944192 - l was kissing her. Are you stoned?
- lt's a long story.
5944280 5946714 We have to get out of here. Come on.
6041000 6043309 Come on, Jim, breathe. Fucking breathe.
6133200 6135760 You looked all right in this, you know.

6156520 6159717 - l can't hear anything.
- l told you, l heard it.
6212920 6215718 Do you think he saw us this time?
